text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle
author: Steve Jobs

text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

text: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals
author: Zig Ziglar

text: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

text: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
author: Henry David Thoreau

text: When one door of happiness closes, another opens; but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one which has been opened for us.
author: Helen Keller

text: Dream big and dare to fail
author: Norman Vaughan

text: Dream big and dare to fail.
author: Chinese Proverb

text: If not you ---- Who? If not now ---- When?
author: Hillel the Elder

text: You are lucky enough to make the best version of yourself
author: Public

text: Live to the fullest
author: Public

text: We don't get long on this earth in these bodies. Why not make the most of it before we go out?
author: Public

text: Service and significance equal success.
author: Fearless Soul

text: If you want a great life, you must commit to leading a great life
author: Denzel Washington

text: You are unique and that is your greatest gift
author: Public

text: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken
author: Oscar Wilde

text: Compare yourself with no one
author: Public

text: The world rewards people who are unapologetically themselves
author: Public

text: They laugh at me because I am different, I laugh at them because they are the same
author: Kurt Cobain

text: Love what you are, what you do and what you are going through
author: Public

text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do
author: Steve Jobs

text: You have to have the serenity to accept the things you cannot change, the courage to change the things you can, and the wisdom to know the difference
author: Reinhold Niebuhr

text: Don't Just aspire to make a living, aspire to make a difference
author: Denzel Washington

text: Compete with your own self, break your own record and think about making the best out of yourself
author: Judy Garland
